note.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Channel)-1 FROM rpt.[Sales_销售渠道客户达成日报] WHERE Update_Time>=CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AND Is_UTD = 1 AND Channel IN ('Vanguard','YH') ;
note.title: 销售渠道MTD达成日报 #Date#
note.body:
销售渠道客户MTD达成日报
当前日期：#Date#
数据来源：YH EDI & Vanguard上传 & ERP
明细：
note.returntable: SELECT [Channel] ,[Customer] ,[Sales] ,[Data_Up_to] ,[Row_Attr] FROM [rpt].[Sales_销售渠道客户达成日报] WHERE Monthkey = CONVERT(CHAR(6),DATEADD(DAY,-1,GETDATE()),112)
